overview: Eugene Walden is co-founder and CEO of 4delite, a cloud-based rich media publishing platform for mobile and online advertisers. A successful serial entrepreneur, heâ€™s an award-winning UI designer whose work has been held by hundreds of millions. He founded and sold NetDoubler, winner of the MacWorld Magazine Networking Product of the Year award, to Asante Technologies in 1996. He designed the first widely-deployed mobile Internet browser for Phone.com. Eugene also managed the UI team at Scalent, where he earned accolades from InfoWorld Magazine for the UI design of the Scalent platform in 2007.
